questSteps.stepDescription: Enter the pyramid south of Uzer. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: If you have not already done so, bring Leela to Senliten by talking to her along the fence north of the prison in Draynor Village.
Easiest way to get to Senliten is the Desert Amulet 4 or Fairy Ring ( DLQ ) then run east.

questSteps.stepDescription: Speak with Senliten. (Chat 3•3•✓)
Talk to the Sphinx in Sophanem with your cat (do not wear a catspeak amulet or cramulet). (Chat 2•3•3•2)
Talk to Jex, who is north-east of the Sphinx. (Chat 2•3•1•2•3)
Return to Senliten. (Chat 3)
Right click Leela to return to the surface.
Enter the temple again but use the explore option. (Chat 2)
Head north and click the ship to get the dowsing rod.
Click the dowsing rod and go to the following locations in the desert. Look in Additional Information for the locations. Closing the arrow interface may cause progress to be lost.
additionalStepInformation: Additional Note: Go to each location and make sure your character gets Dialogue.
The oasis just north-west of the temple.
The oasis by the Camel Warriors, east of Sophanem.
The oasis near the Bedabin Camp.
(Bandit Camp teleport - may break the puzzle but it didnt for OP Tech, as may using a magic carpet)

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to Senliten. (Chat 3)
Head to the waterfall north of the Dominion Tower and climb up it.
Walk north through both sets of double doors
Talk to the spirits (Tirrie, Nirrie, or Hallak) in the north part of the cave. (Chat 1)
Talk to Portmaster Kags in the Menaphos Port District on the southwest pier by the POH portal. (Chat 2)
Enter Crondis's pyramid.
Talk to the High Priest of Crondis.

You must wait until after Crondis asks for each item before gathering it or the requirement will not be satisfied. What you need is in Additional Information. Return and talk to Crondis each time ( Chat 1 )
additionalStepInformation: Cut two acadia logs at the acadia trees in the Menaphos Imperial district.
Collect four pyramid tops from the Agility Pyramid.
Catch eight plover birds in southern Sophanem. ( Double Catches DO NOT COUNT )

questSteps.stepDescription: Catch a Raw beltfish in the southeast corner of the Menaphos Port District or the VIP Skilling area. Return to Crondis (Chat 1)
Cut two Acadia logs at the Acadia trees in the Menaphos Imperial District. Return to Crondis (Chat 1)
Collect four Pyramid tops from the Agility Pyramid Return to Crondis (Chat 1)
Catch eight Plover birds in southern Sophanem. Return to Crondis (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: Any sort of double drop will not count for this. It must be 8 catches, not just 8 plover birds.
Sophanem Slayer Dungeon teleport and run south is the fastest way to get there.

questSteps.stepDescription: Without TELEPORTING after buying, purchase at least 24 Croc ices from Rokuh in Nardah near the fountain to ensure you still have 16 left to turn in. Be quick back to Menophos. They do not need to all be collected in one trip.
additionalStepInformation: Use the Merchant District Shifting Tombs to get to the Port District and return to Crondis' pyramid.

questSteps.stepDescription: After giving her the 16 Croc ices, get ready for combat

The fight with Ukunduka is instanced, and will not warn players if they drop items. When the fight ends, players will be sent back to the non-instanced pyramid without a chance to pick up any dropped items.
additionalStepInformation: It is recommended to stock up a full backpack on food or healing potions
This challenger utilises a special move enabling it to steal your food items, one by one.
Ukunduka does not treat raw fish, Saradomin brews, or baron sharks as food and will not take these items.
In addition, Ukunduka will ignore food that has been dropped on the floor, so one could drop all of their food when the fight starts, then pick up and consume as needed.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Crondis. Use any chat option except chat option 1 for all dialogue boxes. ( Chat 2 )
additionalStepInformation: If not already equipped for combat, leave the conversation just before the player yells "THAT'S ENOUGH!" to prepare for the fight.

questSteps.stepDescription: Kill Ukunduka (stay out of melee distance or use Saradomin brews). There is a safe spot on the stairs leading up to Crondis.
Talk to the High Priest of Crondis.
Return to Senliten.
After the cutscene, speak with Senliten. (Chat 3)
Quest complete!

questDetails.StartPoint: Speak to Leela and Senliten in Senliten's tomb.
ItemsRequired: Enough fishing bait (3-5 recommended) to catch 1 beltfish or activation of Tier 1 prawn perks
Some bait can be obtained during the quest from Meena's Fishing Shop
At least 28,000 coins for buying croc ice
Recommended: Food and combat equipment for the boss fight
Pharaoh's sceptre, Sceptre of the gods or Sophanem Slayer Dungeon teleport tablets
Waterskins or enchanted water tiara for desert heat
